term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - conjugation in gene technology
term.title: conjugation

item.text: The contact-dependent transfer of a part or all of its genome from one bacterial cell (donor) to another (recipient).

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 150 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
